last_episode_to_air.name: Fluffy Jelly Bean
last_episode_to_air.overview: The family introduces its newest member, a 3-legged stray dog Alana names Fluffy Jelly Bean.  The entire family heads to Alabama for Kaitlyn's 2nd birthday, but will June be able to convince Anna to come back with them to Georgia?

name: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo
overview: Alana and her mother, June, have been become two of the more familiar Toddlers & Tiaras faces after a 2012 episode showed Alana drinking go-go juice before a competition. The drink, which worked her into a frenzy in front of the cameras, is a combination of Red Bull and Mountain Dew and had the pair working the talk show circuit earlier in the year to defend their caffeine consumption. Nicknamed Honey Boo Boo, Alana and her family, mother June, dad Sugar Bear and sisters Lauryn, Jessica and Anna, will be the focus of the series when the youngest daughter isn't competing in pageants.

episodes.name: This Is My Crazy Family
episodes.overview: The family heads to the summer Redneck Games to get down and dirty.

episodes.name: Gonna Be A Glitz Pig
episodes.overview: Sugar Bear buys Alana a miniature pig that she names Glitzy, to cheer her up after a couple of pageant losses. Later, June signs Alana and Pumpkin up for an etiquette class.

episodes.name: She Oooo'd Herself
episodes.overview: June saves money for Alana's pageant fees, while Alana gets a new coach and tries to perfect a tough routine. Later, the family throws a baby shower for Chickadee.

episodes.name: I'm Sassified!
episodes.overview: Alana's dress won't fit, and June only has two days to get a new one before a big pageant. Meanwhile, mom and the girls go to the spa as the family get ready for June and Sugar Bear's anniversary.

episodes.name: What Is a Door Nut?
episodes.overview: The family's plans for their annual Christmas in July are interrupted when Anna is rushed to the hospital with contractions; June wonders if the family should send their pet pig back to the breeder.

episodes.name: A Bunch of Wedgies
episodes.overview: A reality series following 6-year-old beauty queen Alana "Honey Boo Boo" Thompson and her family in rural Georgia.

episodes.name: Shh! It's a Wig
episodes.overview: The family celebrate July 4th with a picnic and fireworks; Sugar Bear brings home a pool that requires some assembly; June hunts for a wig for Alana to wear in her next pageant.

episodes.name: Time for Sketti!
episodes.overview: Alana sets up a lemonade stand to raise money for her next pageant. Meanwhile, June invents ways to keep the girls occupied and makes the family's favorite meal, "sketti," for supper.

episodes.name: Ah-Choo!
episodes.overview: June takes the girls to bingo for a chance to win $1000; Alana gets advice on pageants from Miss Georgia 2011; the family celebrate Alana's seventh birthday.

episodes.name: It Is What It Is
episodes.overview: In the Season 1 finale, Alana's preparations for a big pageant are interrupted when Anna goes into labor.

episodes.name: Mo' Butter, Mo' Better
episodes.overview: In the Season 2 premiere, June punishes the girls for not doing their chores by taking away their phones. Meanwhile, the family watch wrestling; enjoy a roadkill supper; and find a slippery substitute for a water slide.

episodes.name: Turn This Big Mama On
episodes.overview: Sugar Bear's birthday party isn't much of a surprise; the family ride go-karts, but June winds up with her own pit crew.

episodes.name: It's Always Something With Pumpkin
episodes.overview: The family talk about Pumpkin on her 13th birthday; Alana starts taking dance classes; Sugar Bear shares his secret plan for June.

episodes.name: The 'M' Word
episodes.overview: Sugar Bear gets dressed up in his nicest funeral shirt as his plan for June is put into motion, while the girls help set the stage for romance with scented candles and Nugget the chicken.

episodes.name: Chubby Chaser
episodes.overview: Sugar Bear proposes to June for the third time, but she still isn't sure she wants to get married.

episodes.name: Safety!
episodes.overview: Jessica and Anna study for their driving tests; the girls teach June the rules to a game called Doorknob; June and Sugar Bear work on the guest list to their ceremony, but their planning is interrupted when Sugar Bear is rushed to the ER.

episodes.name: Runaway Bride!
episodes.overview: June has been busy going to see Sugar Bear in the hospital, so the girls have to pick up the slack and help out around the house. While she’s away, the girls plan the bridal shower.

episodes.name: Big Girls Wear Lace-Ups
episodes.overview: The DIY Bride is checking things off her to-do list, but June is not accustomed to this much planning and her stress level is getting high. Alana and the girls ask about their first dance and suggest that Sugar Bear and June seek professional help.

episodes.name: Get Her Chins Vacuumed
episodes.overview: Sugar Bear is nervous before the ceremony, especially once he realizes he doesn’t have a thing to wear! He brings the girls with him to shop for a tuxedo.

episodes.name: Lift and Scoop
episodes.overview: June goes shopping for a proper-fitting bra. Then the party starts when both Sugar Bear and June let loose at their Bachelor and Bachelorette parties.

episodes.name: Stress Poops
episodes.overview: All the anxiety and stress from planning the ceremony has Mama stuck in the bathroom; the girls have a meeting to go over the to-do list; Sugar Bear and June meet with their potential Redneck Preacher.

episodes.name: Happily Ever After?
episodes.overview: The ceremony is finally here and with all the rain and chaos June is a bundle of stress! On the big day, the girls get beautimous while Sugar Bear gets dressed up in his camo tuxedo. Will the bride make her way down the aisle?

episodes.name: You Need Your Thumb to Vacuum Clean
3 Generations & 1 Pork Rind
episodes.overview: Even a life-size Mario Lopez cut-out can’t boost birthday girl June’s spirits as she’s copes with an empty-nest when Anna and Kaitlyn decide to move out. Extra time allows her to work at the bakery, leaving Sugar Bear alone to become a domestic housewife.

episodes.name: De-Stressin'
episodes.overview: June’s "b*tching" and nagging lands Sugar Bear sick in bed from stress. Will June have to permanently alter what comes out of her mouth to keep her man healthy? Or will Sugar Bear’s de-stressing techniques like "yodega" and racing be more beneficial?

episodes.name: Bingo Face
episodes.overview: June’s love of couponing takes over, leaving Sugar Bear looking for ways to exploit her addiction for affection. The sisters try being affectionate too, as a new "be nice" contest has high stakes: the spare room. Little do they know the contest is rigged.

episodes.name: Top 10 Summer Moments
episodes.overview: Alana's favorite summer memories, from ice blocking to digging mud pits and kissing giraffes.

episodes.name: Forced Family Fun!
episodes.overview: Without Anna and Kaitlyn around, the family spends very little time together. Alana hopes the family’s love for food will reunite them, but her efforts fall just as short as family game night and pottery painting. The family’s last hope lies in the mud.

episodes.name: Civil War
episodes.overview: Anna's dreams of an flashy wedding come to a halt as June joins the couple to a potential venue. Sugar Bear hunts for riches in the yard courtesy of a metal detector and Alana. Expecting only coins, they're shocked to learn what they've uncovered.

episodes.name: Vowel of Silence
episodes.overview: With no critters to play with, June rents Alana a goat from a farm. Unlike Alana, Sugar Bear's been feeling the love and buys some personal items for him and June to use in private. To keep the house quiet, he offers Jessica and Pumpkin money to hush up.

episodes.name: Brain Rest
episodes.overview: The family is in a car accident and Pumpkin has to stay at the hospital with June by her side. Back home, Sugar Bear, Jessica and Alana miss Pumpkin but still revel in their freedom without Mama around. Anna and Michael get matching tattoos.

episodes.name: This Couch is on Fire
episodes.overview: June and Sugar Bear decide it’s time for some home improvement. The girls repaint their "doo-doo" colored walls, June agrees to some face improvements by waxing her beard situation, and the family says "goodbye" to their old couch.

episodes.name: Spring Broken
episodes.overview: It’s Spring break and the girls are bored. After making a "redneck hot tub" in the back of a pickup truck, June and Sugar Bear take the family away to a houseboat vacation and invite Anna, Michael, and Kaitlyn to join in on some quality family time.

episodes.name: Girl Power
episodes.overview: Jessica broke up with her boyfriend, so she and her best girlfriend Carle decide they will be each other’s Prom date. Tensions rise between Anna and June over the wedding details. The family also throws Anna a surprise wrestling themed wedding shower.

episodes.name: Trouble in Paradise
episodes.overview: The girls think Sugar Bear and Mama June's love needs some shakin' up. An anniversary couples massage does the trick in more ways than one. Anna's wedding nears as the bridesmaids dress sizes cause drama, but Anna's about to drop an even bigger bomb.

episodes.name: Ain’t Gonna Leave Me
episodes.overview: Wedding prep increases and June tries to take control of the final decoration plans. Sugar Bear and pals take Michael fishing to initiate him into manhood, but only after he and Alana give taxidermy a try. A final picnic leaves June holding onto Anna.

episodes.name: Annabama
episodes.overview: June's control over Anna's wedding boils over only days before the big day. A quirky party distracts Anna, but leads to a bit of awkwardness. The long-awaited wedding is only the prelude though, as the new family packs up and kisses Georgia goodbye.

episodes.name: McInboring
episodes.overview: Summertime boredom hits, so Jessica gives Pumpkin a makeover.  The family heads to the lake and catapults off "the Blob". June learns from Instagram that Pumpkin has been keeping a secret.  When Pumpkin's ready, she comes out to the family at dinner.

episodes.name: #MamasTheCoolest
episodes.overview: To get the kids off devices, Mama June suggests a family getaway to Six Flags to bring everyone closer together.  Alana has fun, but Pumpkin and Jessica grow frustrated with the kiddie stuff.

episodes.name: My Colors Are The Rainbow
episodes.overview: The girls sneak out of the house, and Sugar Bear grounds them.  Poodle and his new boyfriend Alan go on a wild double-date with June and Sugar Bear.  Sugar Bear comes up with a plan that un-grounds the girls and makes June happy.

episodes.name: Fluffy Jelly Bean
episodes.overview: The family introduces its newest member, a 3-legged stray dog Alana names Fluffy Jelly Bean.  The entire family heads to Alabama for Kaitlyn's 2nd birthday, but will June be able to convince Anna to come back with them to Georgia?
